content: this project will show you how to turn a simple flat circle into a cute bunny by adding perky ears the size is just right to fit a mug or a cup on and the choice of yarn makes these coasters sturdy and super useful all you need is any 2 mm cotton macrame yarn a hook and some free time this bunny coaster is an easy project and the pattern uses standard us terms the circle part is 10 2 cm ~4 in wide
